alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Franklin; Lancaster; Lebanon; Perry; Schuylkill; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:41AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with occasional gusts between 45 and 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Franklin, Perry, Dauphin, Schuylkill, Lebanon, Cumberland, Adams, York and Lancaster Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travelers in high profile vehicles could experience difficult driving conditions, especially in areas exposed to strong cross winds from the south, and locations just to the north of gaps in the ridges.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Franklin; Lancaster; Lebanon; Perry; Schuylkill; York
